Directly proportional to square root of average particle size

question: For which type of bridge, no vertical clearance is required to be provided :

answers.text: Depend on elements of reverse curve

40 mm ; or 40% of average Versine on circular portion, whichever is more

answers.text: For curves of radius 350 m and more, including straight, -5 mm to +3 mm

For through renewal of track, the same tolerance will be applicable as new track

question: As per IRPWM 2020, Sanction of CRS will be required for execution of works in respect of :

answers.text: Construction, rebuilding and strengthening of minor bridges
Opening of stations, junctions and level crossings

question: As per Indian Railways Schedule of Dimensions for BG, revised in 2022, which of the following dimension is NOT correct:

question: The justification for track works shall be prepared on the basis of factually correct data and submitted through :
As per IRPWM 2020, which statement about track renewal is correct;

answers.text: Scattered Renewal is replacement of unserviceable rails, sleepers and fastenings by identical serviceable material of nearly the same vintage
Casual Renewal is replacement of unserviceable rails, sleepers and fastenings by identical serviceable material of nearly same vintage or new components
Complete Track Renewal (Primary) is replacement of unserviceable rails, sleepers and fittings by new material

question: Primary renewals of track are those where:

answers.text: Renewals are done with available materials to ensure track geometry
Only new materials are used in renewals
Renewals are done with released serviceable materials

question: Renewal of switch in a turnout shall be planned under following conditions :

answers.text: Chipped or worn out tongue rail

Loss of section of stock rail 6% for 52 kg and 7% for 60 kg
